scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.build:js: browserify -p tsify src/app.ts -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --extensions .ts ] -p [ browserify-header --file header.js ] -o dist/app.js
scripts.build:css:watch: node-sass -w -r --source-map true --source-map-embed true -o public/css/ --output-style compressed src/sass/
scripts.build:tests:
echo -e 'NOTE: Use either "npm build:unittests" or "npm build:uitests"
' && exit 1
scripts.build:unittests: browserify -p tsify tests/ts/main.ts -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --extensions .ts ] -o dist/ts-tests.js
scripts.build:uitests: npm run build:css && browserify -p tsify tests/ui/main.ts -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --extensions .ts ] -o dist/ui-tests.js
scripts.dist: npm run build && echo "" && node dist/build-package.js
scripts.serve:live: echo 'NOTE: serve:live command has been renamed to devserver'
scripts.devserver: npm run build:css && concurrently --kill-others --names "css,server" -p name "npm run build:css:watch" "budo src/app.ts:dist/app.js -d public -d . -d src --live -- -d -p tsify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --extensions .ts ]"
scripts.test:
echo -e 'NOTE: Use either "npm test:unit" or "npm test:ui"
' && exit 1
